Published: May 15, 2024

In Islamic mysticism, Divine Love (Ishq-e-Haqiqi) represents the deepest spiritual connection...

"Allah will bring forth people whom He loves and who love Him."
— The Quran, Surah Al-Ma'idah 5:54

- Love of Knowledge
- Love of Awe
- Love of Gratitude
- Pure Love

This love purifies the heart and prepares it for the Hereafter.
